titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of pharmaceutical grade phospholipids.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce the duty on pharmaceutical grade phospholipids.
